name: Red-23 (Louis Denizet)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 42 - LD JAM 42: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/red-23


 CONTROLS 
  • ARROW KEYS to move
  • LEFT CLICK to attack
  • RIGHT CLICK to dash

Discover a gloomy planet where flesh monsters reproduced… A lot!


-

🗡️ RED-23 is a HACK N SLASH 🗡️

Make your way through degenerates monsters, slash and dash your way to extermination.
